name: MCP Gas Price Agent
description: Provides real-time gas prices and intelligent transaction recommendations across Ethereum, BNB, and Polygon networks. Supports natural language queries via NLP Agent.
author: Samar Abdelhameed

endpoints.description: Returns live gas prices for Ethereum, BNB, or Polygon. Use ?network=ethereum|bnb|polygon as a query param.
Provides a recommendation on whether it's a good time to send a transaction based on current gas price.
Accepts a natural language question and responds with relevant gas price information or recommendation.
